board.Tile

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile Area.getRandomTile()
      Gives a random Tile objects in the Area.

      Returns a random tile.
      Tile Area.getTile(int index)
      Returns Tile objects at given index.
      Tile Grid.getTile(int row, int col) 
      Tile Grid.getTile(Tile base, int[] direction)
      Return tile object at given direction according to base Tile object.

      Area Grid.getAdjacentTiles(Tile tile) 
      int[] Grid.getAllStates(Tile tile)
      Returns all states of a tile.
      Area Grid.getLine(Tile base, int[] direction)
      Returns Area object holding all tiles in given line.
      Area Grid.getLine(Tile base, int[] direction, int length)
      Overloaded version of getLine( Tile, int[]) except the length of the line can be determined.
      Area Grid.getLine(Tile base, int[] direction, int startPoint, int endPoint)
      Overloaded version of getLine( Tile, int[]) except the start and end points can be determined.
      Area Grid.getRange(Tile center, int radius) 
      Area Grid.getRange(Tile center, int radiusStart, int radiusEnd)
      Gets all tile with given range.

      Return tile object at given direction according to base Tile object.
      boolean Grid.isIn(Tile tile)
      Works as the same as isIn( int, int)
      void Grid.set(Tile tile, java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object object)
      Sets object of a particular tile.
      void Grid.setState(Tile tile, java.lang.String name, int state)
      Sets state of a particular tile.
